type.description: Describes the nature of scrollbar visibility, similar to how the scrollbar preferences in MacOS control visibility of native scrollbars.

:scrollHideDelay.description: If type is set to either "scroll" or "hover", this prop determines the length of time, in milliseconds, before the scrollbars are hidden after the user stops interacting with scrollbars.

dir.description: The reading direction of the scroll area. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
